Uses of Class
oracle.nosql.driver.ResourceLimitException

  • Packages that use ResourceLimitException 
    Package Description
    oracle.nosql.driver
    Contains the public API for using the Oracle NoSQL Database Cloud as well as configuration and common parameter classes used in database operations.

    • Uses of ResourceLimitException in oracle.nosql.driver

      Subclasses of ResourceLimitException in oracle.nosql.driver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BatchOperationNumberLimitException
      Thrown to indicate that the number of operations included in NoSQLHandle.writeMultiple(oracle.nosql.driver.ops.WriteMultipleRequest) operation exceeds the system defined limit.
      class  DeploymentException
      Thrown to indicate that an attempt has been made to create or modify a table using limits that exceed the maximum allowed for a single table or that cause the tenant's aggregate resources to exceed the maximum allowed for a tenant.
      class  EvolutionLimitException
      Thrown to indicate that an attempt has been made to evolve the schema of a a table more times than allowed by the system defined limit.
      class  IndexLimitException
      Thrown to indicate that an attempt has been made to create more indexes on a table than the system defined limit.
      class  KeySizeLimitException
      Thrown to indicate that an attempt has been made to create a row with a primary key or index key size that exceeds the system defined limit.
      class  RequestSizeLimitException
      Thrown to indicate that the size of a Request exceeds the system defined limit.
      class  RowSizeLimitException
      Thrown to indicate that an attempt has been made to create a row with a size that exceeds the system defined limit.
      class  TableLimitException
      Thrown to indicate that an attempt has been made to create a number of tables that exceeds the system defined limit.
